features.2: Added linux server fileshare for on premise usage.
features.3: Zero'd out x-axis on inoculation time when entered.
features.4: Added an install script to install new packages on software updates.

bugfixes.1: Software update now works properly with more than 1 software update available.
bugfixes.2: Disconnecting and reconnecting a reader now continues scanning.
bugfixes.3: Failed scan analysis now removes the scan instead of returning zero.

other.1: Added SIB support for on premise testing.

bugfixes.1: Fixed a bug causing the file save location to be incorrect.
Fixed a bug causing startup crashes.
bugfixes.2: Fixed a bug with a deprecated library causing instability.

features.1: Added release notes dialog to software updates.
features.2: Added version to the bottom left of the screen.
features.4: Summary pdf updated to have a summary page.

features.1: Updated inoculation to zero out y-axis
features.2: Updated plotting to use Skroot Growth Index (SGI)
